text: Billy Rose's Jumbo is a 1962 MGM musical movie. It stars Jimmy Durante, Doris Day, Martha Raye, and Stephen Boyd. The movie was directed by Charles Walters. It featured Busby Berkeley's choreography. It was nominated for an Academy Award for the adaptation of its Rodgers and Hart score. ==References== Category:1962 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Screenplays by Ben Hecht Category:Movies directed by Charles Walters Category:Movies set in circuses
title: Billy Rose's Jumbo
